eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.model

Class CkanGroupOrgBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.model.CkanGroupOrgBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CkanClient.GroupForDatasetPosting, CkanGroupOrg

    public abstract class CkanGroupOrgBase
extends Object
    Abstract class to model the same data structure that Ckan uses for creating both groups and organizations. Since they are different things and work with different APIs we made two different implementations, CkanGroup and CkanOrganization. The Ckan way to tell the difference is the isOrganization() field).
    Since:
    0.4.1
    Author:
    David Leoni

      • getState

        public CkanState getState()
        The current state of the group, e.g. 'active' or 'deleted', only active groups show up in search results and other lists of groups, this parameter will be ignored if you are not authorized to change the state of the group (optional, default: 'active')

      • setState

        public void setState(CkanState state)
        The current state of the group/organization, e.g. 'active' or 'deleted', only active groups/organizations show up in search results and other lists of groups/organizations, this parameter will be ignored if you are not authorized to change the state (optional, default: 'active')
